docs.snippet: Brazilian prosecutors on Wednesday said they had opened an investigation into whether London-based political consultancy Cambridge Analytica acted illegally in Brazil, as controversy over the firm's data harvesting practices spreads across the glo...

headline.print_headline: Brazil Prosecutors Open Investigation Into Cambridge Analytica
headline.main: Brazil Prosecutors Open Investigation Into Cambridge Analytica

docs.snippet: A prosecutor said the pictures a North Carolina man posted on Facebook of his dead wife and daughter are enough proof to show he is guilty of murder.

headline.print_headline: Man Who Posted Photos Online of Dead Wife and Child on Trial
headline.main: Man Who Posted Photos Online of Dead Wife and Child on Trial

docs.snippet: Volatility in U.S. equity markets this year is pushing investors not only to invest in stocks abroad, but also to commit their money to an even more foreign place: the hands of stockpickers rather than index funds.

headline.print_headline: Globalists Buck U.S. Index Fund Trend
headline.main: Globalists Buck U.S. Index Fund Trend

docs.snippet: An Egyptian court on Tuesday ordered authorities to revoke the operating licenses of the Uber and Careem ride-hailing services and block their mobile apps and software.

headline.print_headline: Egyptian Court Rules Uber, Careem Illegal; Appeal Expected
headline.main: Egyptian Court Rules Uber, Careem Illegal; Appeal Expected

docs.snippet: An emerging field, digital phenotyping, tries to assess people’s well-being based on their interactions with digital devices.

headline.print_headline: Scouring  Our Clicks  For Clues  To Our Health
headline.main: How Companies Scour Our Digital Lives for Clues to Our Health

docs.snippet: The Latest on a shooting at a southern Maryland school (all times local):

headline.print_headline: Latest: Shooting Victim Dies After Removal of Life Support

docs.snippet: The recipe for Bogart’s Bitters was lost for nearly a century.

headline.print_headline: To Mix: A Bitters Recipe Returns to the Scene
headline.main: Legendary Bitters Return to the Mix

docs.snippet: A British TV station sent a reporter to pose as a prospective client, and secretly filmed Cambridge Analytica’s chief executive offering to engage in dirty tricks.

headline.print_headline: Political Firm Laid Out a List Of Dirty Tricks
headline.main: Cambridge Analytica, Trump-Tied Political Firm, Offered to Entrap Politicians

docs.snippet: Jennifer Clair focuses on knife skills, meat cookery, pan sauces, roasting vegetables, blanching vegetables and preparing leafy greens in her new book.

headline.print_headline: To Learn: To Master the Kitchen, A Rudimentary Guide
headline.main: An Instruction Book on Six Basics of Cooking
